fields.original_string: private static final Pattern resourceIdPattern = Pattern.compile("^[1-9][0-9]*$");

private static final Pattern invalidEscapePattern =
      Pattern.compile("(" + "([^\\\\]|^)(\\\\\\\\)*)\\\\([^,\\\\]|$)");
